name: Bubble
description:
Do you feel stressed and overworked? Do you need to get your mind off of your exhausting everyday life? If so, you're in the wrong place. Grab your copy of the world's least effective mindfulness experience today!

CONTROLS:

- Left click to increase total combo 

- Right click to use total combo 

- Get a high score, duh

Warning: the game has no exit function yet. Don't forget Alt + F4 going into this
